text: tavratayada injilayada, ovunge deviyange sannidhanayen ovunta pahala karana lada (anit) dharmayanda, (ættenma) ovun baragena anugamanaya kara tibune nam (kisima amarukamak nomætiva) ovunta ihalin (ahasin)da, ovunge padayanta yatin (bhumiyen)da anubhava karannata ida tibuni. namut ovungen samaharekma (rju margayehi sitina) dæhæmi janatavak vasayen sitinnaha. ovungen bahutarayak karana kriyavan itamat napuru dæya vasayenma ætteya
